t=input()
while t:
    x,y=map(int,raw_input().split())
    res=x+y
    res=list(str(res))
    while '0' in res:
        res.remove('0')
    x=list(str(x))
    y=list(str(y))
    while '0' in x:
        x.remove('0')
    while '0' in y:
        y.remove('0')
    res1=int(''.join(x))+int(''.join(y))
    res1=str(res1)
    if(res1==''.join(res)):
        print "YES"
    else:
        print "NO"
    t=t-1
